item.description:

📝 Repository: ArtemZarubin/PixelArtWeatherML

📄 Descrizione: Android weather forecast app featuring a unique pixel art UI and a local TensorFlow Lite model for "Feels Like" temperature refinement. Diploma project (ZNU). Tech: Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, MVVM, Hilt, Retrofit, Room.
